content: X-ECH MX Cable holder Plastic bunched cable holder for use with collated nails ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Friction-fit in the nose of BX/GX/DX nailers for easy handling Stacking possible Silicone-free and halogen-free material Fast cable installation when used with the GX 120-ME gas nailer Can be used on ceilings and walls Applications Fastening multiple electrical cables Installing electrical cables quickly and neatly (max. fastener spacing 60-80 cm, depending on cable rigidity) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Bunched cables Material: Polyamide (PA), Halogen-free, Flame-retardant, UV-resistant (fair) For use with (tools): BX 3, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6, GX 3 Technical Data | Application | Cable Fastenings, Conduit Fastening | Material | Polyamide (PA), Halogen-free, Flame-retardant, UV-resistant (fair) | For use with (tools) | BX 3, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6, GX 3 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Steel | Approvals | CSTB, ETA | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2018729 - Bunched-cable hol. X-ECH 15/B MX kit - Package Size 100 pc - 2018891 - Bunched-cable hol. X-ECH 30/B MX kit - Package Size 50 pc
